spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent replication of the complex wall layout and room adjacencies. Dimensional scaling is largely preserved. Minor deductions for simplified door/window openings which lack the specific orientation details of the original plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Perfect score. The model is a floating cutaway on a dark neutral background. No text labels or measurement lines are present, and all rooms are accounted for without hallucinations.

furniture_mapping.notes: Block-style furniture accurately mirrors the floor plan layout, including the dining table, sofas, and beds. One minor point deducted for the simplified representation of the kitchen counters and utility room fixtures.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to style constraints. Low-poly geometry with flat colors and soft shading is used correctly. The camera is isometric, though slightly lower on the vertical axis than a perfect 45-degree angle.

detected_errors.description: Specific swing direction for internal doors is not visually defined in the 3D block-out.
The kitchen island/counter geometry is slightly abstracted compared to the detailed L-shape in the original plan.
